author: bingbing8
body: Add tests for deserialized types and methods, dynamic parameters, generic types, Lacline ending, myinvocation, ordered attribute of hash table. Please review. Thanks!

comments.body:

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body:
> ```
>     ($strBytes | ? { $_ -eq $crByte } | measure-object).Count | Should Be 5
> ```

couldn't this just be `@($strBytes | ?{ $_ -eq $crByte}).Count | should be 5` - why use measure object?

title: Add tests to language part 3
